## Disaster Univariate Exploration

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(sum_death = sum(Total.Deaths,na.rm=TRUE),
            sum_affected = sum(Total.Affected, na.rm=TRUE),
            affected_to_death = sum(Total.Deaths/Total.Affected,na.rm=TRUE))
```
